attributes.action: Stop predators from grooming innocent children (women and men).
attributes.additional_details: So that less innocent children are victimised every day and that children can sleep at night knowing they will wake up in the morning and be safe.
attributes.background: Put laws in place so that children and adults are more protected from people with bad intentions (block people from websites immediately after inappropriate activity so people don’t have to speak up, activity should be tracked).

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are already laws in place, but you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, if there are specific changes you'd like to see happen.
